titleInfo.title: SNIT@SageMath (Stability of Networks of International Trade using SageMath)

mods.abstract:
SNIT@SageMath presents an implementation of an algorithm using SageMath (version 7.6) for finding the stable set of trade networks in a three-country model and generating the data set as well as various graphics for the parameter space.
Note: The path '/Path/To/Folder/' needs to be replaced by the corresponding path on your machine and there requires four additional sub-folders, namely 'General', 'noCU', 'noFTA', 'noFTAaCU'.
